Name: Idle Skilling
About the game: Idle Skilling is the idle game with ALL the skills! Keep leveling up even while you're offline! There are 21 different skills to level up, each one interacting with several others! You only start with access to 3 skills, but slowly unlock the rest as you progress in the fighting zones!
